item.title: OpenFAAS with TLS via Faasd and Terraform on Openstack
item.description: Intro OpenFAAS is a serverless tool. One of the things I like most about it - it’s pretty agnostic. You can bring your own infra or orchestrator and roll with Dockerfiles (as long as they conform to the OpenFaas serverless workload definition). No vendor lock in! Their tagline: OpenFaaSÂ® makes it simple to deploy both functions and existing code to Kubernetes While OpenFaas is mainly used with k8s, there are other providers available too.
